bill.title: Address opioid prescribing and addiction treatment
bill.description: To amend sections 4723.52, 4729.01, 4729.44, 4729.75, 4729.79, 4729.85, 4730.56, 4731.83, and 5119.363, to amend, for the purpose of adopting a new section number as indicated in parentheses, section 3715.08 (3719.064), and to enact sections 3719.063, 4729.283, and 4765.45 of the Revised Code regarding naloxone, naltrexone, and medication-assisted treatment.

history.action: Refer to Committee: Health, Human Services and Medicaid
